name: @fogo/sessions-idls
description: The IDLs for the on-chain programs involved in the Fogo Sessions protocol

scripts.build:cjs: tsc --project tsconfig.build.cjs.json --verbatimModuleSyntax false --module commonjs --outDir ./dist/cjs && echo '{"type":"commonjs"}' > dist/cjs/package.json
scripts.build:idl: mkdir -p src/idl && mkdir -p src/types && anchor idl build --program-name session-manager --out-ts src/types/session-manager.ts --out src/idl/session-manager.json && anchor idl build --program-name example --out-ts src/types/example.ts --out src/idl/example.json
